ruok.quality.globalquality.tooltip: Adjusts distance, graphics quality, particle effects, etc.
ruok.quality.autoquality.tooltip: Automatically adjusts graphics quality based on your computer's performance every 30 seconds upon entering the game (up to 6 times).
ruok.quality.renderlivingdistance.toolti: Only renders living entities within the specified radius cube centered around you.
ruok.quality.renderlivingentity.tooltip: Number of living entities currently rendered within the specified 'Render Living Entity Distance' cube.
ruok.key.value.error.max: Unable to add or reduce, value already at maximum or minimum!
ruok.benchmark.value: Benchmark completed. Your current score is:
ruok.quality.renderweathernetwork.toolti: Disabling this will disable network packet modifications for rain and snow.
ruok.quality.renderlighting.tooltip: Enabling will enable lighting updates, otherwise, it will disable them.
ruok.quality.renderentityentity.tooltip: Number of entities currently rendered within the specified 'Render Living Entity Distance' cube.
ruok.quality.renderfastitem.tooltip: Disable rotation and bobbing of dropped items.
ruok.quality.rendertntexplosions.tooltip: Default is enabled. Disabling will prevent TNT explosions from being rendered.
ruok.quality.renderdisplayitem.tooltip: Dropped items will display their names, e.g., 'Dirt x1'.
ruok.quality.renderweather.tooltip: Can decrease quality or disable weather effects.
